name: FRigUnit_SetRelativeRotationForItem
doc: SetRelativeRotation is used to set a single rotation from a hierarchy in the space of another item

Child: The child item to set the transform for
Parent:
The parent item to use.
The child transform will be set in the space of the parent.
bParentInitial:
Defines if the parent's transform should be determined as current (false) or initial (true).
Initial transforms for bones and other elements in the hierarchy represent the reference pose's value.
Value: The transform of the child item relative to the provided parent
Weight: Defines how much the change will be applied
bPropagateToChildren:
If set to true children of affected items in the hierarchy
will follow the transform change - otherwise only the parent will move.
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
